name: Jasmine
description:
In a strange world within a painting a little girl named Jasmine just wants to find her way home. Join her on this adventure of making friends, meeting creatures and meeting... enemies?
This puzzle 2D platformer demo is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to the rich world of Jasmine!

Controls: WASD to move. Arrowkeys are also possible. From a certain point on you can use either space/W/uparrow to jump.

This game is a small demo of level 1 of Jasmine. If you have any questions, feel free to drop a comment down below or DM me on Twitter.
